source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_00<tab>Serendipity is quite pleased to see you.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_00<tab>彫金師ギルドのセレンディピティーは、冒険者に仕事を紹介したいようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_01<tab>Roroton, the merchant for whom you previously crafted a pair of malachite earrings, has commissioned you to make a fire brand of peerless quality. Craft the item to the best of your ability and present it to Serendipity for inspection.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_01<tab>セレンディピティーから依頼を受けた。ウルダハの彫金師ギルドにいる「セレンディピティー」に「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　2078)) 01 /var>」を納品しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_02As usual, Gigi assists with the evaluation of your work. However, in an unusual turn of events, your fire brand appears to trigger bizarre pyromaniac tendencies hidden deep within the mammet's soul. Nevertheless, Serendipity assures you that there is no need for concern, and that she will see that Roroton receives his order without incident.

※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 40.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SEQ_02セレンディピティーにを納品した。冒険者の作ったは、ネジが興奮するほど良い出来だったようだ。これならロロトンも満足するだろう。また注文があったときに備え、腕を磨いておこう。

※彫金師のレベルが40以上になると、セレンディピティーから次の彫金師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_TODO_00<tab>Deliver a fire brand <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Serendipity.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_TODO_00<tab>セレンディピティーに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　2078)) 01 /var>を納品

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_001あっ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、お待ちしていました！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_002<tab>You remember Roroton, the merchant for whom you made those exquisite earrings? He paid a visit not long ago, hoping to find you present. In fact, he was positively heartbroken that he couldn't speak with you in person.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_002先日の宝石商「ロロトン」さんを覚えておいでですか？
彼がさきほどギルドに来て、
あなたに依頼したい品があるとのことでした。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_003<tab>Ahaha, it's hard to believe he was once so furious with us! It's as if that unfortunate incident never happened at all!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_003ふふふ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
どうやら、だいぶロロトンさんに
気に入られたようですね！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_004<tab>But returning to the matter at hand, Roroton has commissioned you to craft a fire brand─one of peerless quality, of course.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_004今回のロロトンさんからの依頼は、
「」です。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_005<tab>When you've finished, I must insist that I evaluate your work. It's not that I don't trust your craftsmanship, but Roroton is an important client, to say the least.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_005作ったら、私のところへ持ってきてください。
彫金師ギルドのマスターとして、
一応、品質を確かめさせていただきますね。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_010<tab>Is the fire brand ready yet, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_010あっ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
「」は作れましたか？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_011<tab>All right, Gigi! I know this is your first evaluation in a long while, but I'm sure you can handle it!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_011ネジ！　久しぶりの鑑定よ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの上達ぶりを
しっかり評価してあげてね！

TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_GIGI_000_012……ネジジ……ファイア……ブランド……
火！　火！　火火火ヒヒ火火火火火！
火火火ヒ火火火火火火ヒヒ火火火火ヒヒ火ヒ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_GIGI_000_013<tab>GiGi Is ThE oNe TrUe LoRd Of ThE iNfErNo! MwAhAhAhAh!!!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_GIGI_000_013フヒヒヒヒヒ火ヒヒヒヒヒ火火火ヒヒヒヒ火火火ヒヒヒ
人ヒヒヒヒ火火ヒヒヒヒ火ヒヒ火ヒ火火ヒ炎ヒヒ火火火
ヒヒヒ火ヒヒヒヒ火火ヒヒヒヒ火ヒヒヒヒ火ヒヒヒヒヒ

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_014<tab>No, Gigi, <var 1A 02 /var>no<var 1A 01 /var>! What did I tell you!? <var 1A 02 /var>No fires<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_014ってうわあっ！
ど、どうしちゃったの！？　ネジっ！
止まって！　止まれーっ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_015<tab>Please forgive him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I might have knocked something loose when performing maintenance earlier...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_015ご、ごめんなさい！
なんだか、この間の修理で発話回路をいじったせいで、
ちょっと混乱しちゃっているみたい。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_016<tab>But I'm certain it's nothing important. Really! Other than the occasional outburst, he's been relatively stable. ...Well, for <var 1A 02 /var>Gigi<var 1A 01 /var>, anyway.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_016でも、きっと大丈夫！
だってホラ、元気だから！
……………………多分。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_017<tab>Ah, yes, the scepter! I must say that you've once again done a marvelous job. I'm particularly impressed by how well you set the eye of fire in the scepter.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_017え～と……「」の話、っと……。
呪術士は、己のエーテルを魔法に変換する際、
魔器に嵌め込んだ「念珠」を、注力点にするんです。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_018<tab>This gemstone is the focal point of the design, both aesthetically and practically speaking. It is what allows a thaumaturge to channel the aetherial energies within...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_018の場合、
火属性を多分に含んだ岩石……
「」が「念珠」になります。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_019<tab>And it's what transforms the piece from common instrument of death into stunning work of art!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_019この「」は、呪術士の使う杖として、
かなり高い品質だと思います！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_020<tab>Any veteran thaumaturge would doubtless be satisfied by both the quality and efficacy of this fire brand. I just know Roroton will be happy to receive it!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_020しかも、この銀細工の精巧さ！
戦いの道具だけではなく、芸術的な魅力も備えています。
これならロロトンさんも絶対、喜びますよ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_GIGI_000_021<tab>I sAy We GiVe HiM tHe GiFt ThAt KeEpS oN gIvInG! i SaY wE gIvE hIm ThE gIfT oF fIrE!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_GIGI_000_021ネジジジ！
アイツ　ニハ　モッタイナイ！　モッタイナイナイ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_022<tab>Gigi! There will be absolutely no gift giving on my watch! Have I made myself clear!?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_022こら！　ネジ、お得意様の悪口を
言うんじゃありませーん！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_023<tab><sigh> You can leave the rest to me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll see that Roroton receives your fire brand─and nothing else!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD350_00655_SERENDIPITY_000_023それでは、この「」は、
私の方からロロトンさんに渡しておきますね。
ご苦労さまでした！
